# resolveStationName(for:with:)

**Instance Method**

Resolves the name of the radio station.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func resolveStationName(for intent: INSetRadioStationIntent, with completion: @escaping (INStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
```

```swift
optional func resolveStationName(for intent: INSetRadioStationIntent) async -> INStringResolutionResult
```

## Parameters

- **intent**: The intent object containing details about the userâ€™s request. Use this object to get the initial information, if any, provided by the user.
- **completion**: The block to execute with your response. You must execute this block at some point during your implementation of this method. This block has no return value and takes the following parameter:



## Discussion

Implement this method to resolve the name of the radio station. Use this method to set the radio to the station associated with the resolved name.

## Resolving the Intent Parameters

- **resolveRadioType(for:with:)**: Resolves the radio type.
- **resolveFrequency(for:with:)**: Resolves the radio station frequency.
- **resolveChannel(for:with:)**: Resolves the channel number for the radio station.
- **resolvePresetNumber(for:with:)**: Resolves the preset number used to select the radio station.

items.description: Resolves the channel number for the radio station.
items.name: resolveChannel(for:with:)
